titleStmt.title: The advantage of afflictions: a sermon preached before the Right Honourable House of Peers, Ianuary 28. 1645. being the day of publike humiliation, in the Abbey Church, Westminster. / By Gaspar Hicks, a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, Gaspar, 1605-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1645; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
